tiles.name: neo_mumbai_sky_city_north
tiles.description: The northern district of the Sky-City, shimmering towers reserved for the Conglomerate elite. Hovercar traffic hums constantly.

tiles.name: corporate_plaza_district
tiles.description: Gleaming office buildings housing the headquarters of the Neo-Tech Conglomerates. Security drones are ever-present.

tiles.name: arcology_residential_zone
tiles.description: Massive, self-contained residential structures providing housing for mid-level corporate employees.

tiles.name: monorail_transfer_station
tiles.description: A major transit hub connecting the Sky-City to the upper levels of the Underlevels via a high-speed monorail.

tiles.name: industrial_smelter_complex
tiles.description: A sprawling factory complex processing raw materials extracted from the lower levels, belching out thick smoke.

tiles.name: gamma_7_upper_access_shaft
tiles.description: One of the main access points into Sector Gamma-7, heavily guarded by Conglomerate security forces.

tiles.name: recycling_processing_plant
tiles.description: A massive facility where waste from the Sky-City is processed and recycled, or dumped into the lower levels.

tiles.name: contaminated_water_reservoir
tiles.description: A large reservoir of polluted water, a byproduct of the industrial processes. Access is restricted.

tiles.name: broken_highway_overpass
tiles.description: A section of the old pre-Collapse highway system, now crumbling and unusable. A haven for scavengers.

tiles.name: neo_mumbai_sky_city_east
tiles.description: The eastern district of the Sky-City. Known for its advanced research facilities and pristine parks.

tiles.name: conglomerate_research_lab
tiles.description: A high-security research facility developing advanced technologies for the Conglomerates.

tiles.name: hydroponics_farm_dome
tiles.description: A climate-controlled dome where food is grown for the Sky-City residents. Guarded against contamination.

tiles.name: underlevel_service_tunnel
tiles.description: A dimly lit service tunnel connecting different sections of the Underlevels. Often used for smuggling.

tiles.name: gamma_7_residential_block
tiles.description: A densely populated residential area in Sector Gamma-7. Home to Vansh Rishi and his family.

tiles.name: black_market_bazaar
tiles.description: A bustling black market where scavenged goods and illicit technologies are traded. Risky, but profitable.

tiles.name: collapsed_habitation_zone
tiles.description: A sector where buildings collapsed during the Great Collapse. Now filled with makeshift shelters and scavengers.

tiles.name: toxic_waste_dump
tiles.description: A vast wasteland where toxic waste is dumped from the upper levels, a constant threat to the Underlevel residents.

tiles.name: derelict_power_station
tiles.description: A decaying power station that once provided energy for the city. Now a dangerous place to explore.

tiles.name: contaminated_river_delta
tiles.description: The delta of a river choked with pollutants and industrial waste. A breeding ground for disease.

tiles.name: neo_mumbai_sky_city_west
tiles.description: The western district, known for its luxury apartments and entertainment venues for the elite.

tiles.name: entertainment_district_spire
tiles.description: Soaring spires house casinos and virtual reality arcades for the enjoyment of the wealthy.

tiles.name: luxury_apartment_complex
tiles.description: Exclusive residences with panoramic views of the smog-choked landscape below.

tiles.name: gamma_7_ventilation_shaft
tiles.description: A large ventilation shaft that pumps filtered air into the lower levels, but is prone to breakdowns.

tiles.name: makeshift_clinic
tiles.description: A rudimentary clinic run by volunteers, providing basic medical care to the Underlevel residents.

tiles.name: resistance_cell_hideout
tiles.description: A hidden base of operations for a resistance cell fighting against the Conglomerates.

tiles.name: abandoned_subway_tunnel
tiles.description: A dark and dangerous tunnel that once served as part of the city's subway system. Now a refuge for the desperate.

tiles.name: slum_settlement
tiles.description: A squalid settlement built on top of a toxic waste dump. Inhabitants struggle for survival.

tiles.name: pre_collapse_ruins
tiles.description: The remnants of old Mumbai before the Great Collapse. A reminder of a lost world.

tiles.name: desiccated_mangrove_swamp
tiles.description: A withered coastal mangrove forest destroyed by rising sea levels and industrial waste.

tiles.name: neo_mumbai_central_command
tiles.description: Central command of the Neo-Mumbai Conglomerates, the beating heart of their power.

tiles.name: omni_net_server_farm
tiles.description: A massive server farm housing the Omni-Net, the Conglomerates' surveillance network.

tiles.name: conglomerate_propaganda_center
tiles.description: A center for producing propaganda promoting the Conglomerates' ideology and control.

tiles.name: gamma_7_filtration_plant
tiles.description: A crucial facility that attempts to filter air and water for Sector Gamma-7, often failing catastrophically.

tiles.name: makeshift_school
tiles.description: A clandestine school where children learn forgotten knowledge and skills.

tiles.name: underground_farm
tiles.description: A hidden farm where crops are grown using recycled water and artificial light.

tiles.name: sealed_off_laboratory
tiles.description: A laboratory sealed off during the Great Collapse, rumored to contain valuable pre-Collapse technologies.

tiles.name: radioactive_wasteland
tiles.description: A region contaminated by radioactive waste, dangerous and uninhabitable.

tiles.name: coastal_defense_turret
tiles.description: Automated turrets defending the coast from pirates and rebels.

tiles.name: flooded_industrial_zone
tiles.description: Submerged ruins of factories and warehouses from the pre-Collapse era.

tiles.name: neo_mumbai_north_gate
tiles.description: Heavily guarded perimeter checkpoint controlling entry to and from the city.

tiles.name: drone_patrol_corridor
tiles.description: Regularly patrolled skyways where Conglomerate drones maintain surveillance and security.

tiles.name: transportation_hub_north
tiles.description: Bustling network of maglev lines, cargo rail, and automated transport vehicles.

tiles.name: gamma_7_security_checkpoint
tiles.description: Conglomerate soldiers are a common sight, controlling all entrances and exits in Gamma-7.

tiles.name: community_kitchen
tiles.description: A volunteer-run service offering meager meals to those in need in Gamma-7.

tiles.name: engineering_guild_workshop
tiles.description: Skilled mechanics attempt to maintain the area's aging infrastructure, using whatever spare parts they can find.

tiles.name: network_node_scrapyard
tiles.description: A massive pile of discarded Omni-Net components, picked over for valuable scraps.

tiles.name: deforested_foothills
tiles.description: Once lush forests, now barren from industrial pollution. Only the hardiest weeds survive.

tiles.name: coastal_military_outpost
tiles.description: Armed to the teeth, these bunkers ensure no illegal vessels enter or leave the city.

tiles.name: chemical_processing_lagoon
tiles.description: Brightly coloured waste pools that reek of heavy toxins - the waste product of many industries.

tiles.name: conglomerate_data_center
tiles.description: A vault of information, storing citizen and industrial details and protected by the highest-level security.

tiles.name: recreation_sim_center
tiles.description: Upper-level facilities that offer users a chance to experience simulated natural environments, a true luxury.

tiles.name: conglomerate_executive_apartments
tiles.description: Extravagant, spacious living quarters with views that span the entire polluted landscape.

tiles.name: gamma_7_community_center
tiles.description: A gathering place to share information, gossip, and network in Gamma-7.

tiles.name: recycling_district_refinery
tiles.description: Industrial-level waste refinement and smelting, a critical part of the Conglomerates' operations.

tiles.name: information_broker_hub
tiles.description: A shadowy meeting-place where data runners trade in valuable Conglomerate information.

tiles.name: hidden_tunnels_network
tiles.description: A maze of maintenance passages where the lights have long gone out - dangerous but useful.

tiles.name: barren_mining_hills
tiles.description: Stripped of all natural resources, these hills have become little more than a source of dust storms.

tiles.name: smuggling_coastline
tiles.description: A lawless area of beach with hidden coves, used for importing illegal goods.

tiles.name: irradiated_salt_flats
tiles.description: Nothing can survive in this deadly environment, except the most dangerous scavengers.

tiles.name: central_processing_center
tiles.description: The hub from which all raw materials are redistributed for industrial use.

tiles.name: drone_servicing_station
tiles.description: Where fleets of mechanical eyes are repaired, maintained, and upgraded for Conglomerate operations.

tiles.name: energy_grid_substation
tiles.description: A crucial point in the distribution network, that is constantly monitored by the Conglomerates.

tiles.name: gamma_7_repair_factory
tiles.description: Skilled labourers and dangerous machinery create make-shift solutions to every kind of problem.

tiles.name: market_exchange
tiles.description: Where residents of Gamma-7 buy, sell, and barter for whatever goods they can find.

tiles.name: tech_recycling_plant
tiles.description: Old tech is brought back to life in a constant attempt to circumvent the Omni-Net.

tiles.name: illegal_modification_garage
tiles.description: A haven for speed freaks and vehicle enthusiasts to modify their cars in dangerous ways.

tiles.name: polluted_rainwater_catchment
tiles.description: Despite the high pollution, residents need to find ways to collect fresh water.

tiles.name: coastal_power_station
tiles.description: A large facility converting waste heat and wave power into usable energy.

tiles.name: heavy_metal_desert
tiles.description: Even the most hardy plants struggle to survive here in this wasteland.

tiles.name: under_city_storage
tiles.description: Vast storage areas beneath the roads, left for decay and forgotten.

tiles.name: luxury_housing_development
tiles.description: Where the wealthy can look down on the residents of the under-city.

tiles.name: corporate_training_complex
tiles.description: Highly secure facilities where employees are trained and assimilated into Conglomerate culture.

tiles.name: gamma_7_refugee_camp
tiles.description: Those who have lost everything gather here for safety and mutual aid.

tiles.name: old_railway_yards
tiles.description: Derelict, overgrown areas left to rust after the Collapse.

tiles.name: underground_medical_practice
tiles.description: A last resort for those who can't afford a real hospital.

tiles.name: network_cable_access
tiles.description: Highly sought-after entry points into the Omni-Net.

tiles.name: rubble_quarry
tiles.description: The last accessible materials that are readily available, and vital to the Underlevels.

tiles.name: oil_slick_shoreline
tiles.description: Birds and sea-life don't stand a chance in this toxic landscape.

tiles.name: dystopian_vista_overlook
tiles.description: A scenic point high above the city where you can see all the under-city.

tiles.name: transportation_drone_factory
tiles.description: Factory churning out swarms of drones.

tiles.name: prison_detention_center
tiles.description: Where dissenters and criminals are incarcerated and forgotten about.

tiles.name: holo_entertainment_arcade
tiles.description: Offering a brief escape from the realities of the Underlevels.

tiles.name: gamma_7_salvage_yard
tiles.description: Where scavengers bring their haul, hoping to find a buyer.

tiles.name: gated_community
tiles.description: Enclaves of security and green foliage for the wealthy.

tiles.name: reclaimed_water_aquifer
tiles.description: Precious water sources.

tiles.name: collapsed_bridge
tiles.description: Ruined bridge.

tiles.name: eroded_canyon
tiles.description: Windswept erosion.

tiles.name: artificial_lake
tiles.description: Fake lake for upper class.

tiles.name: factory_farms
tiles.description: Growing vat vegetables.

tiles.name: commuter_city_outer
tiles.description: Where most live far from wealth.

tiles.name: suburban_homes
tiles.description: Middle-class residents.

tiles.name: underlevel_tunnels
tiles.description: Secret passages, full of dangers.

tiles.name: flooded_streets
tiles.description: Sea level rise.

tiles.name: overrun_slum
tiles.description: Slums, squalor and death.

tiles.name: polluted_forest
tiles.description: Dying trees and toxic soil.

tiles.name: research_bunker
tiles.description: Mysterious lab location.

tiles.name: collapsed_skyscraper
tiles.description: Once a sign of wealth and progress, now an empty corpse

tiles.name: shipping_docks
tiles.description: Bringing in goods for the elite

tiles.name: construction_site
tiles.description: Ongoing projects for the rich.

tiles.name: the_collapse_landmark
tiles.description: Memorial to the lost.
